Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-09

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5.x with modern JavaScript framework + React 18+ (or Angular 17+), TypeScript, REST API client, UI component library (Material-UI or Ant Design) (ui)
- None (stateless client app - all data from API) (ui)

- .NET 8.0 (C# 12) + NEEDS CLARIFICATION (ASP.NET Core, EF Core, MediatR, FluentValidation candidates) (master)
